briefdescription.para: This is used by the target box's autocomplete feature, and is automatically invalidated & refreshed each time the sessions list changes.
Gets or sets a boolean that determines whether or not device/session icons are shown in the UI.
Gets or sets the hotkey editor mode, which can be either false (basic mode) or true (advanced mode).

detaileddescription.para:
Advanced mode allows the user to perform additional actions in the hotkey editor:
Create and delete hotkeys.
Change the action bindings of hotkeys.
Rename hotkeys.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets whether the window should be minimized during startup. The window can be shown again later using the tray icon.
Gets or sets whether the program should check for updates.
Gets or sets whether notifications are enabled or not.
The filename of the Update Utility, including extensions but not qualifiers. See _updateUtilityResourcePath
The fully qualified name of the Update Utility as an embedded resource.
Displays a message box prompting the user for confirmation, and if confirmation is given, resets all hotkeys to their default settings using HotkeyManager.ResetHotkeys.
Retrieves the list of releases from the Github API, and if a newer version is found a message box is shown prompting the user to update.

simplesect.para: True when the autoupdater is ready & waiting for the program to shutdown, otherwise false.

briefdescription.para: Writes the update client from the embedded resource dictionary to the local disk.

parameterdescription.para: This method uses asynchronous stream operations, setting this to any value other than -1 will set a timeout in milliseconds before throwing an error and returning.

simplesect.para: The absolute filepath of the updater utility's executable.
